title: How to Catch Swordfish in RuneScape

steps.title: Find places around RuneScape where you can fish for swordfish.
steps.content: Find places around RuneScape where you can fish for swordfish. Musa Point Catherby (members) Fishing Guild (members) Rellekka (members)

steps.title: Attach a harpoon to your tool belt.
steps.content: Attach a harpoon to your tool belt.

steps.title: Find a fishing spot that is labeled "Cage/Harpoon".
steps.content: Find a fishing spot that is labeled "Cage/Harpoon". Click on it.

steps.title: Bank and sell them at the Grand Exchange.
steps.content: Bank and sell them at the Grand Exchange.
